feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.23
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove unnecessary save button for automation steps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14198
  • [BUDI-8434] Default value implementation on the backend. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14177
  • [BUDI-8436] Make sure a field cannot both have a default value and be required. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14186
  • Multi-cell operations for tables by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14023
  • Allow Opening Certain Context Menus With Right Click by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14169
  • Fix Screen History Issue by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14207
  • Fix Automations Breaking When Their Datasource is Deleted by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14195
  • DynamicFilter fixes by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14145
  • Improved handling around invalid relationship column by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14194
  • Fix to show Formula column type picker again by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14210
  • Conditional table cell and row styles by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14185
  • Fix for duplicate columns in SQS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14212
  • Any type for createMockContext by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14211
  • Trim data on automation sdk by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14215
  • Fix oracle parsing for CRUD operations, remove need to install oracle client by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14217

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.22...2.29.23

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add logic to prevent panel and modals from closing when screen load actions are available by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14182
  • Fix for ButtonGroup Bindings. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14225

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.23...2.29.24

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add all HBS helpers to manifest by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14214
  • Fix failing test due testcontainer conflicts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14229
  • Move "find row" to sdk by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14224
  • Debugging output for startup of Budibase by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14235
  • Polyfill for Buffer in isolated-vm by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14227
  • Lock CI images to specific SHAs by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14237
  • Fix issue with trigger filters not saving by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14231
  • Fix issue with nulls in lucene isEmpty filter by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14234
  • Don't show datasource options for array bindings that lack table IDs by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14228
  • Adding bulkRemove utility for CouchDB by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14239

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.24...2.29.25

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.26
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Row action automation display in frontend by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14209
  • Prevent edits and deletions for row action automations by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14218
  • Expose row action definition by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14238
  • Row actions automation creation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14219
  • Fix importing internal tables by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14252
  • Renaming some js objects by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14254
  • Row action run api by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14247
  • Form Screen Templates Generate Relevant Row Ids, Permission Roles are Automatically Generated by @Ghrehh in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14192
  • Fix/verify sso bug by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14253
  • Fix issue with stepId being undefined when importing app by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14265
  • Bundle pro to final bundles by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14268
  • Bump requirejs from 2.3.6 to 2.3.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14266
  • update account-portal ref by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14273
  • Fix for searching by row ID (with a limit) when the row has many related rows by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14257
  • Fix to accomodate automations without triggers by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14274
  • Reduce automation store updates and API fetches by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14271
  • Disallow adding row action automations by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14279

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.25...2.29.26

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prevent test container name conflicts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14282
  • Save autofields on bulksaves by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14280
  • Improve typings by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14281
  • Fix issue selecting the same file multiple times while importing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14284
  • Fix for HTTP 400 issue seen in Datadog logs by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14285
  • Record SQS queries in DataDog. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14291

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.26...2.29.27
